instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.

input: The possession of video and audio recordings with the intent to be used to stir-up racial hatred, and a final charge of the possession of the Encyclopedia of the Afghani Jihad, which, is said to have information "of a kind likely to be useful to a person committing or preparing an act of terrorism".

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: All three credit card executives also mentioned an ongoing Federal Reserve System review of credit card rules that already proposes a 45-day notification ahead of any rate changes.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The mayor of Champaign, Illinois denies that Barack Obama is eligible to hold the highest office in the United States, joining others who question the validity of the president's birth certificate.
output: ចៅហ្វាយក្រុង ឆាំផេន រដ្ឋ អ៊ីលីណយបានបដិសេធថា លោកបារ៉ាក់អូបាម៉ាគ្មានសិទ្ធិកាន់អំណាចខ្ពស់បំផុតនៅក្នុងសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកបានទេ​ដែលបានរួមជាមួយអ្នកដទៃទៀតចោទសួរពីសុពលភាពរបស់វិញ្ញាបនបត្រកំណើតរបស់លោកប្រធានាធិបតី។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: He attempted to sing the first line of the song, but instead said "Ladies and gentlemen, I love you, and I thank you for coming, but I can no longer continue."
output: គាត់បានព្យាយាមច្រៀងឃ្លាទីមួយនៃបទចំរៀង ប៉ុន្តែនិយាយជំនួសវិញថា "លោក លោកស្រី អ្នកនាង កញ្ញា ខ្ញុំស្រលាញ់អ្នកទាំងអស់គ្នា ហើយខ្ញុំអរគុណដែលបានមកទស្សនា ប៉ុន្តែខ្ញុំមិនអាចបន្តការសំដែងបានទៀតទេ។"

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Gonzales's statement also supported the decision of the DA to conduct further investigations into the city's contract.
output: សេចក្តីថ្លែងការណ៍របស់លោក ហ្គនហ្សាលេស ក៏បានគាំទ្រការសម្រេចរបស់ DA ដើម្បីធ្វើការស៊ើបអង្កេតបន្ថែមទៀតចំពោះកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ទីក្រុងផងដែរ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: There is absolutely no place in hockey for what I did.
output: នៅក្នុងកីឡាហុកគីពិតជាគ្មាននរណាធ្វើដូចខ្ញុំឡើយ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Assuming that the size and distribution of the clouds are representative, Nicastro and colleagues made the first reliable estimate of average density of baryons in such clouds throughout the Universe, finding it consistent with the mass density of the missing baryons.
output: ដោយសន្មត់ថាទំហំ និងការបែងចែករបស់ពពកនេះគឺមានលក្ខណៈតំណាង លោកនីខាស្រ្តូ និងមិត្តរួមការងារបានធ្វើការប៉ាន់ស្មានដែលទុកចិត្តបានជាលើកដំបូងពីដង់ស៊ីតេមធ្យមនៃបារីយ៉ុងដែលនៅក្នុងពពកបែបនេះក្នុងចក្រវាឡទាំងមូល ហើយបានរកឃើញថាស្របគ្នានិងដង់ស៊ីតេម៉ាសនៃបាយ៉ុងដែលបាត់ខ្លួន។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: In a press release, the Foundation stated that several users of the forum, sufferers of epilepsy, experienced harsh migraines and seizures as a result of the attack.
output: នៅក្នុងការផ្សាយព័តិមានមួយ អង្គការនេះបានបញ្ជាក់ថាអ្នកប្រើប្រាស់គេហទំព័រពិភាក្សាយោបល់នេះមួយចំនួន ដែលជាអ្នកមានជំងឺអេភីលិបស៊ី បានមានអាការៈឈឺក្បាលខ្លាំងព្រមទាំងការប៉ះពាល់លើខួរក្បាលដែលជាលទ្ធផលនៃការវាយប្រហារនោះ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The opposition in parliament even called Jung an "enemy of the constitution" and called for him to resign.
output: បក្សប្រឆាំងក្នុងសភាបានថែមទាំងហៅ លោកជុង ថាជា"សត្រូវរបស់រដ្ឋធម្មនុញ្ញ" និងប្រាប់ឲ្យគាត់លាលែងពីតំណែង។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: OAS resolved to suspend "immediately" the de facto Honduran government lead by Roberto Micheletti in accordance with the Inter-American Democratic Charter.
output: OAS បានធ្វើសេចក្ដីសម្រេចចិត្តព្យួរ "ភ្លាមៗ" រដ្ឋាភិបាលហុងឌុយរ៉ាសតាមព្រឹត្តន័យ ដែលដឹកនាំដោយលោក រូប៊ឺតូ មីឆែលឡេទី ដោយអនុលោមតាម ធម្មនុញ្ញប្រជាធិបតេយ្យអន្តរអាមេរិក។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Chinese production accounts for almost 65% of Mattel's overall production.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Donald Rothwell, a Professor of International Law at the University of Sydney, has said that, unlike countries such as Singapore, it may not be long before the two are executed.
output: ដូណ័រល រុដវែល សាស្រ្តាចារ្យផ្នែកច្បាប់អន្តរជាតិនៃសកលវិទ្យាល័យស៊ីដនី បានមានប្រសាសន៍ថា ខុសពីប្រទេសផ្សេងទៀតដូចជាសិង្ហបុរី វាអាចមិនយូរទេ មុនពេលអ្នកទាំងពីរត្រូវកាត់ទោស។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: An estimated 33 people died in Guangdong, an important economic area near Hong Kong.
output: តាមប៉ានស្មានមនុស្ស33នាក់ស្លាប់នៅក្វាងទុង ដែលជាដែនសេដ្ឋកិច្ចសំខាន់នៅជិតទីក្រុងហុងកុង។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Fighting words were exchanged in the Australian House of Representatives over the matter of the division of Medicare safety net payments per electorate.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: It must be approved in a joint session of the Senate and the Chamber of Deputies, with at least a two-thirds majority.
output: វាត្រូវតែបានអនុម័តនៅក្នុងសម័យប្រជុំរួមមួយនៃព្រឹទ្ធសភានិងសភាតំណាងរាស្រ្ត ជាមួយយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ច្រើនជាងពីរភាគបី។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Professor Plimer said of the 101 questions in his book, "They're questions that kids should be asking of teachers, because if the teacher can answer it means they might know something about the subject."
output: សាស្រ្តាចារ្យផ្លីមឺបាននិយាយអំពីសំនួរទាំង101សំនួរក្នុងសៀវភៅរបស់គាត់ថា "ពួកវាជា សំនួរដែលក្មេងៗគួរតែសួរទៅគ្រូរបស់ពួកគេ ពីព្រោះបើគ្រូអាចឆ្លើយបានមានន័យថា គ្រូប្រហែលជាដឹងខ្លះៗអំពីមុខវិជ្ជានោះ។"

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The EU reviewed the ban this week, but ruled that those responsible "have still to demonstrate that they have completed the corrective actions" needed to lift the ban.
output: សហភាពអឺរ៉ុបបានត្រួតពិនិត្យការហាមឃាត់នោះនៅសប្តាហ៍នេះ ប៉ុន្តែបានសម្រេចថាអ្នកដែលទទួលខុសត្រូវ "នៅតែត្រូវបង្ហាញថាពួកគេបានបញ្ចប់សកម្មភាពកែប្រែនានា" ដែលចាំបាច់ដើម្បីដកបម្រាមនេះ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: For at least two years, Gugliemucci claimed to have leukaemia.
output: យ៉ាងហោចណាស់អស់រយៈពេលពីរឆ្នាំ ដែលហ្គូកលេមូខស៊ី បានអះអាងថាមានជំងឺមហារីកគ្រាប់ឈាម។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: However, former members of the Church identified the men as belonging to the church which has been described as a sect.
output: ទោះជាយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ អតីតសមាជិកនៃវិហារនោះបានកំណត់បុរសទាំងនោះជារបស់វិហារនោះ ដែលត្រូវបានគេពិពណ៌នាថាជានិកាយសាសនាមួយ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: "We see there is a fantastic opportunity to grow online advertising and the share of the online market."
output: "យើងសម្លឹងឃើញថាមានឱកាសដ៏អស្ចារ្យមួយដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍការផ្សព្វផ្សាយពាណិជ្ជកម្មតាមអនឡាញ និងចំណែកទីផ្សារអនឡាញនេះ។"

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The idea for an international instrument for tobacco control was initiated in May 1995 at the 48th World Health Assembly.
output: គំនិតសំរាប់ជាឩបករណ៍អន្តរជាតិសំរាប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាំជក់គឺត្រូវបានផ្តើមនៅខែឩសភាឆ្នាំ1995នៅសភាសុខភាពពិភពលោកទី48។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Most international observers, however, had deemed the elections fair and free, although there had been some criticism that the electoral commission had disqualified MDM candidates for all but four provincial assemblies on technical grounds.
output: ទោះបីជាយ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយអ្នកសង្កេតការអន្តរជាតិភាគច្រើន បានចាត់ទុកការបោះឆ្នោតមានលក្ខណៈសេរី និងយុត្តិធម៌ ថ្វីបើមានការរិះគន់មួយចំនួនដែលថាគណកម្មការរៀបចំការបោះឆ្នោតបានដកហូតសិទ្ធិបេក្ខភាព MDM ទាំងអស់ប៉ុន្តែលើកលែងសំរាប់សភាខេត្តបួនលើផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The first minister is speculated by many to be Ian Paisley, the leader of the Democratic Unionist Party.
output: រដ្ឋមន្ត្រីទីមួយត្រូវបានមនុស្សជាច្រើនរំពឹងថាជា លោកឡេន ភេសឡេយ ដែលជាមេដឹកនាំរបស់គណបក្សសហជីពប្រជាធិបតេយ្យ។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: The military reported that after taking the youth to an isolated area they searched him and found another four explosives.
output: យោធាបានរាយការណ៍ថា បន្ទាប់ពីបានយកយុវជនទៅកន្លែងដាច់ដោយឡែកមួយ ពួកគេបានស្វែងរកគាត់ និងបានរកឃើញគ្រឿងផ្ទុះចំនួនបួន ផ្សេងទៀត។

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Khmer language.
input: Vaccinations will be repeated on 26 March in the six key countries, and again on 24 April for all 19 countries involved.
output: ការចាក់ថ្នាំបង្ការនឹងអនុវត្តឡើងវិញនៅថ្ងៃទី26 ខែមីនានៅក្នុងប្រទេសសំខាន់ៗចំនួនប្រាំមួយ និងម្តងទៀតនៅថ្ងៃទី24 ខែមេសាសម្រាប់ប្រទេស ទាំង19​ ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
